page.title: 13WEST FELTON EDUCATION
page.content: THE PRESENT VILLAGE SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1873 AND IS A BRICK BUILDING WITH AN OUTSIDE TOILET BLOCK,AND A WOODEN DEMOUNTABLE CLASSROOM.THE MAIN BUILDING HAS TWO CLASSROOMS,AN OFFICE (WHICH ALSO SERVES AS A STAFF ROOM AND STATIONERY STORE) AND A SMALL HALL. AT PRESENT THERE ARE 80 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL AND THREE FULL-TIME TEACHERS AND ONE PART-TIME TEACHER.THERE ARE ALSO TWO DINNER ASSISTANTS TO SERVE THE MEALS BROUGHT FROM PANT SCHOOL,TWO ANCILLARY HELPERS AND A SECRETARY/CARETAKER.SEVERAL PARENTS COME IN TO SCHOOL TO HELP IN THE INFANT CLASS AND ALSO WITH SWIMMING,NEEDLEWORK AND WOODWORK.A PARENTS SUPPORT GROUP RAISES MONEY TO BY EXTRA EQUIPMENT FOR THE SCHOOL. THERE IS A PRE-SCHOOL PLAYGROUP EVERY TUESDAY AND FRIDAY IN THE CHAPEL RUN BY TWO SUPERVISORS AND ONE MOTHER.
